name: Custom Camera Strap
description:
Custom order for Sue

Extra long - 57 inches.

The leather camera strap is made of the highest quality full-grain leather tanned in one of the oldest American tanneries. The leather is supple but strong. Each piece is double riveted for increased strength. The buckles are made of solid brass.

The strap is 1/2 inch wide. The neck sling is 2 inches wide. Please make sure that 1/2 inch strap will work with your camera.

name: Custom Order Valet Tray
description:
Reserved for Emily
Larger Valet Tray with an interior of 7 inches

Complimentary Personalization.

Scheduled to Ship by Decemember 20th.
Priority Shipping

name: Leather  Personalized Fortune Cookie Ornament
description:
Write your own fortune!  

The ornament comes with a blank slip of thin leather where you can write your own message. 

Handcrafted without the use of machines, each ornament is cut, shaped, and finished by hand. The leather of both the cookie and the note is full-grain American leather.

The Fortune Cookie Ornaments look great on a tree, in a center piece, or around the house. 
Keep them around and use them to celebrate Chinese New Year.

Because the ornaments are hand made, slight variations may occur.

name: Leather Field Notes/Moleskine Notebook Cover / Made in USA
description:
Keep your thoughts and drawings from getting rumpled and ripped with this Leather Field Notes or Moleskine Notebook Cover.

The Materials:

Made of full-grain American tanned leather, this cover is worthy of showing off.   The leather is conditioned and made water resistant with American-made leather cream. The leather will darken into a rich patina with use and exposure to the sun.

The Making Of:
The notebook cover is made entirely by hand without the use of machines.  Full-grain leather is cut, the edges are finished and the rivets are set all by hand.  

Monogramming:
Complimentary monogramming is available.  1/4 inch tall capital block letters are embossed on the lower right corner of the notebook.  Please email cicadaleathercompany@gmail.com to indicate the letters you would like. 
This cover will fit any 3.5 by 5.5 notebook including Field Notes and Moleskine. 

One custom Cicada Leather Company notebook is included.  The pencil in not included. 

Handcrafted in Missoula, MT

name: Leather iPhone Case with Card Holder Wallet
description:
Perfectly sleek and simple, this iPhone Case and Wallet holds your phone and several cards.  Fits iphone 4 and 4/S.

Made with a single piece of American full-grain leather and hand stitched with American-made thread, this phone wallet is designed for comfort and durability. Using a single piece of leather allows for the case to have soft rounded edges which makes carrying your phone comfortable. 

The leather will darken into a  rich patina with use. The case is hand-stitched using the strongest methods possible. It is stronger than any machine stitching and will withstand much stress.

Ditch the wallet and simplify your life with this leather phone sleeve. The leather is conditioned to be water-resistant.

Dimensions: 5.25 x 3.5

name: Leather Messenger Bag Satchel Made in USA
description:
Leather messenger bag made in America.  Handcrafted in Missoula, Montana.

Made to be the last briefcase you'll ever need. This leather messenger bag has all the right pockets for all your gadgets.

The Making Of-
This bag is entirely handmade without any machines. The full-grain leather is cut by hand. It is then hand stitched using the time-honored saddle stitch method. This method is stronger and more durable than machine stitching. The edges are slicked and finished by hand. Everything is done just as traditional leather-smiths and saddle-makers have always done it, slowly and surely. 

The Pockets-
This briefcase has just the right pockets. Inside, there is a large main compartment, a pocket for your iPad or legal pad, a slot for business or credit cards and a pen slot. Externally, there is an sleeve for papers. Within that back sleeve there is a pocket for your iPhone.

The Straps -
The briefcase is secured in two ways - with snaps and with buckles.  The strap and buckle discretely hide the snaps which allows for easy opening.

The Shoulder Strap and Pad-
This shoulder strap is adjustable and removable. A solid brass buckle allows for adjustments of the length of the strap. Remove the strap entirely with snaps at both ends. 
A lightly padded shoulder pad makes this bag comfortable to carry. The pad is made of two layers of hand stitched supple leather.

The Leather -
The leather is full-grain 6 ounce leather tanned in one of American's oldest tannery. The leather is made to age beautifully. It will darken naturally with use and time. Only about 1% of the leather on the market meet the high standards we set for this bag.

The leather satchel has been conditioned with American-made cream to increase water resistance. 

The Hardware-
The buckles and rings on this case are made of solid brass. All rivets and snaps are handset.

Dimensions:
15 x 12.5 x 3.5

Please read our policy page.
Send us a message with any questions and we'll get right back to you.

name: Leather Dopp Kit with Secret Snap Made in USA
description:
Originally used by World War II soldiers, the leather shaving bag has become the symbol of the distinguished man. 

The new version of our popular dopp kit! Now with both a snap and a buckle for easy opening! 

Complimentary Monogramming:
Personalize your toiletry bag with your initials. Send us an email at cicadaleathercompany@gmail.com with your preferred letters. Monogramming is limited to 1/4 block capital letters embossed on the left corner of the flap.

The Making Of: 
Handcrafted slowly and with dedication. Leather is cut by hand. Then the bag is hand-sewn using the saddle stitch method with is stronger than machine sewing. The thread is American-made. The edges of the bag are finished by hand.  Finally leather cream is applied.  

The Materials:
The leather is the high-quality full-grain American-tanned leather.  It will change with time and use as it develops a rich patina.Your adventures and travels will leave their marks on the bag like a sort of journal. To see how leather darkens click here.
https://sphotos-b.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-snc7/483266_487441747974038_1659750849_n.jpg
The dopp kit has been conditioned and made water resistant with American-made all-natural leather cream.  The buckle is sturdy solid brass and the snap is steel.

Dimensions: 10.5 inches by 3.5 inches wide

name: Leather Pencil Bag / Leather Pouch / Made in USA
description:
Leather Pouch Case for Pens, Sunglasses, Make Up, Tobacco or any other item. Made in USA.   

Made of American-made full-grain leather, thread and conditioners.  Handcrafted for beauty and durability.  The leather pouch is hand-stitched using a method that is stronger than any machine stitching.

The bag fastens with a strap wrapped twice around the case.

Dimensions: 7 inches by 2 inches

Pens, ruler ect are not included

name: Leather Dopp Kit / Made in USA
description:
Handcrafted without the use of machines, this leather dopp kit is for hardworking gentleman. Originally used by World War II soldiers, the dopp kit has become the symbol of the distinguished man. 

______________________________________

The Materials:
The leather is full-grain leather tanned in America. The buff leather will darken, developing a rich patina with use and time. The more you use it the better it will look! Conditioned with American-made leather cream, the toiletry bag is water-resistant.  The bag closes with a strap and a solid brass buckle. 

The Making Of:
The dopp bag is created entirely by hand without the use of machines.  The hand-stitching method used is stronger than any machine stitch making this bag highly durable. The leather is cut by hand.  The edges are finished in the traditional means.  


Dimensions: 10.5 inches by 3.5 inches 

______________________________________

We offer complimentary monogramming to personalize your dopp kit.  Please send us an email at cicadaleathercompany@gmail.com to indicate with letters you would like.  
______________________________________
Does not come with razor, cream, comb ect.

Handcrafted in Missoula, MT

name: Miniature Leather Dopp Kit / Made in USA
description:
Organize your smaller toiletries inside our full-sized Dopp Kit.

The leather bag allows for easy access to the elusive little things like clippers and tweezers.  This bag fits nicely within the full-sized dopp kit, taking up less than a quarter of the interior space. 

The miniature leather dopp kit fastens with a simple buckle. Our logo is embossed in the leather just below the flap. 

The leather is full-grain leather tanned in a century-old American tannery. The bag is hand stitched for increased durability. The leather has been conditioned and is water-resistant.  

The leather toiletry bag is designed to age beautifully.  The leather will develop a rich patina with age. The bag only looks better the more you use it!

This kit is entirely handcrafted in America. 

Dimensions: 4 inches by 3 inches

This Listing is for the Small Dopp Kit only. 

See the full-sized options here -http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/product/monogrammed-dopp-kit-2-0-handcrafted-in-america

name: Passport Travel Wallet / Made in USA
description:
A perfect travel companion, this wallet has a slot for your passport and two for cards and cash.  Designed for durability and simplicity, the passport wallet will keep you organized for all your travels.

Made of full-grain American leather and American thread.
The travel wallet is hand stitched using methods that are stronger than any machine stitching.  This ensure that the wallet will survive any adventure.


Dimensions: 5.5"x 4.25" or 14 cm x 10.5 cm

Handcrafted in America.

name: Slim Leather Bifold Wallet / Handmade in America
description:
Say goodbye to that bulky wallet!
Keep it simple with two slots for cards and a larger slot for cash. Made with a single piece of high-quality top-grain American leather, the wallet feels wonderful and looks better. 

The bifold wallet is hand-stitched with American-made threads. The saddle stitch method used here is more durable than machine stitching so your wallet will last a very long time.

The leather has been conditioned and made water resistant with an all natural conditioner made in Washington.

The edges are hand dyed a dark brown and hand finished for a polished look.

Hand cut, hand stitched, hand edged, and hand finished in America.

name: Lace and Leather Womens Wallet - Made in USA
description:
Delicate but sturdy.  Slender but functional.  The perfect leather clutch.


This clutch has a place for everything you carry: two slots for credit cards, a large slot for cash, and a pocket for change.  The wallet fastens with a magnetic closure.

The lace is hand stitched to the leather. It adds a sense of delicacy to the wallet. 

The leather is conditioned with American leather cream to increase water-resistancy.

Dimensions: 8" x 11" unfolded

name: Thin Leather Bifold Wallet / Made in USA
description:
A slim leather bi-fold wallet made in America. 

At just over 1/2 inch thick, this bifold wallet is one of the slimmest full-sized wallets on the market.  The leather is supple but sturdy full-grain American leather.  This is some of the finest leather on the market.

Despite its thinness, the wallet has room for everything.  In addition to a cash slot, it has three credit card slot (each can hold 3-4), an ID holder and an addition slot for business cards or notes. 

This wallet is completely handmade. Hand-cut leather is hand- stitched for extra durability. The methods used to stitch this wallet are more durable than any machine stitch which means you wallet will last a long, long time. The edges are then hand finished. The leather is conditioned and water resistant. 

The leather wallet will age beautifully. The leather will develop a deep patina and its own personality.

Dimensions: open - 9"x 4.25"
closed - 4.5" x 4.25

Made in America.

name: Leather iPad Case / Leather iPad Folio / Made in USA
description:
This leather iPad case will outlast the tech you put in it. For when you need more than just an iPad sleeve, this folio has a pocket for you iPad, notes, pens, and your charger.

Each iPad folio is hand cut from the best full grain leathers tanned in America. In order to create a long-lasting product, the stitching is done by hand in a traditional method that is stronger than machine sewing. The iPad case has been conditioned and made water resistant with quality American-made leather cream. 

The leather will darken with age. It will develop a beautiful patina. To see how the leather will darken - http://cicadaleathercompany.tumblr.com/post/38906374540/wornleatherbelt

Fits iPad 2 and 3.

Artisan crafted in USA

name: Leather Messenger Bag Satchel for Men Made in USA
description:
Mens leather messenger bag handmade in America.  Use for laptops, school books, or weekend get-aways. 

- - Currently orders take 4 to 5 weeks before shipping. - - 

Beautiful, sturdy, and functional, this leather messenger bag is perfect for students, travelers, and business people. With room for all your tech gadgets, this attache has all the right pockets.

The leather satchel designed for durability. It is hand stitched using the renown saddle stitch which is stronger than any machine stitch. The thread used is American made. 

The leather is smooth and supple. Cicada Leather Company proudly uses only American tanned leather. This leather is the finest vegetable tanned leather. The bag is conditioned with American-made all-natural balm to protect the leather and add water resistance. This messenger bag will darken with time and use. To see an example of how leather changes click here - http://cicadaleathercompany.tumblr.com/post/38906374540/wornleatherbelt
You leather bag will evolve as you use it. It will record your travels and adventures.

The buckles are solid brass.

The strap is adjustable and has a lightly padded shoulder pad.

Dimensions: approximately 17 x 13 x 4 inches

/////Currently orders take 4 to 5 weeks before shipping/////

name: Satchel Backpack Messenger Bag / Made in USA
description:
This convertible bag can be both a messenger bag and a backpack. 

This bag is designed for travel. It is shown here at 10,243 feet above sea level overlooking the Yellowstone caldera. This summer, I traveled thousands of miles with my own messenger backpack. Together, we hiked across the Continental Divide several times, summited several peaks, and walked many miles.

Hardware:
The clips, rings, and buckles on this bag are sturdy plated brass. The D-rings are securely fastened to the bag with a hidden rivet and a hand-stitched tab. 

The Stitching: 
As with all of our pieces, this bag is entirely hand stitched without the use of machines. The saddle stitch method we use is the strongest possible stitch, stronger than any machine-made stitch. The thread is American-made.

The Leather:
The leather is finest American tanned leather available. It is 5-6 ounce vegetable tanned leather which means it is thick enough to withstand stress but light enough to carry. The leather will develop a rich patina with use and exposure to sun. It will only take a few adventure before this bag starts to show its own character.

<><><>  Made to order and will ship in 3-5 weeks <><><>

Our logo is tucked discretely under the flap.

name: Personalized Leather Camera Strap / Made in USA
description:
Monogrammed leather camera strap handmade in America.  Perfect for dslr or retro film cameras and can be used as a neck strap or shoulder strap. 

The straps are 1/2 inch wide.  Please ensure that the strap will fit your camera.  The straps are adjustable. The neck strap is 2 inches wide for comfort and strength.  

This camera strap is made of high-quality full-grain leather tanned in one of the oldest American tanneries. The leather is supple but strong. Each piece is double riveted for increased strength. The buckles are made of solid brass.

Complimentary Personalization:
Personalize this leather camera strap by engraving your name! Please send an email to Cicadaleathercompany@gmail.com to indicate what you would like your strap to say.  Letters are limited to 1/4 tall block capital letters.

The leather camera strap has been conditioned and made water resistant. It will age beautifully as the leather relaxes and gains a deep patina.

Handcrafted in America without the use of machines.

name: Monogrammed Leather Accessory Tray Made in USA
description:
This leather catchall tray is a wonderful way to organize your change, keys, jewelry and accessories.  A simple valet tray adds elegance to your home. 

The beautiful high-quality full-grain leather is tanned in one of America's oldest tanneries. It is hand cut and hand finished. 

Personalization is complimentary. Please indicate the two (2) or three (3) initials you would like engraved in the leather upon check out. 

The catchall pictured here is not the exact one you will receive and thus will vary slightly.

Dimensions: 4 inches square in the interior.

Handmade in America!

name: Note Pad Refills for Leather Notepad
description:
These small note pads fit perfectly into the pocket of our leather notepad case. 

For our leather notepad case click here - http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/product/refillable-leather-notepad-for-men

Dimensions: 5.25" x 3.5"

name: Refillable Leather Notepad Cover / Monogrammed / Made in USA
description:
Notepads always end up ragged and worn; protect them with this leather notepad case!

This leather notepad holder is made of  high quality American full-grain leather. It has a pocket for notepads to slip into. The pocket is snug enough to hold the pad in but not so tight as to make changing the pads a struggle. Used pages fold back into the pocket. 

The leather is hand cut and hand finished. It has been conditioned and made water resistant.

Monogramming is complimentary.  Please send an email to cicadaleathercompany@gmail.com to indicate which initials you would like to use.  

The leather notepad case comes with one (1) notepad. For more notepads click here - http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/product/refill-pads-for-leather-notepad

Dimensions: 6.5"x5.25
Notepad :5.25"x 3.5"

Made in America

name: Leather Beach Bag Tote - Handmade in America
description:
Made of the finest American-tanned leather

Hand dyed a rich Mahogany

Handstitched with strong black waxed linen thread so increased durability

Closes with a single steel nickle snap

The leather has been conditioned and made water resistant

Dimesions: 18L x 16H x 9W

name: Leather Trouser Strap
description:
Keep your pants clean and out of the gears with this leather pant strap. Made of the highest quality top grain leather and brass button stud, the strap wont crimp your style. With three holes, the strap is adjustable.

The leather is American tanned leather that will age beautifully. The leather will darken with time, use, and exposure to sun. The leather is durable 7 ounce leather.

To see how the leather ages click here - http://cicadaleathercompany.tumblr.com/post/38906374540/wornleatherbelt


Hand cut and hand finished, the pant strap is crafted in American without the use of any machines. The edges are hand dyed a dark brown.

The pant strap has been conditioned and made water resistant using an all natural conditioner made in Washington state.

Sizes:
Small- 12 inches
Medium- 15 inches
Large- 18 inches

name: Bicycle Frame Strap - Made in USA
description:
Free your hands up with this bike strap. Strap on a bottle of booze, an umbrella or a yoga mat.

Made of the high quality American tanned leather. Hand crafted without any machines. Hand cut, hand edged, hand dyed, and hand conditioned. The leather is conditioned with all natural leather conditioner made in Washington. The buckles are made of brass.

name: Leather Bicycle Straps - Made in USA
description:
Leather Bike straps allow you to carry just about anything on your bike. Strap on your yoga mat, your umbrella, your picnic blanket, or a bottle of wine. 

The strap loops around the frame of your bike or the back rack and then buckles over your stuff. 

Chain the two together for larger items.

-- Sold as a Set of Two --

Measures 3/4 inch by 18 inches.

The leather is high quality top-grain leather tanned in America. The buckle is a nickle plated brass buckle. 

This bike strap is completely handcrafted without the use of machines. The strap is hand cut, hand edged, hand dyed, and hand conditioned. 

The leather has been conditioned and made water resistant.

Made in Missoula, Montana.

name: Brown Leather Growler Coozie / Made in USA
description:
Is your next party a BYOBOYB? Bring Your Own Beer On Your Bike!

Next time you bike to the brewery, strap your growler on.  Your leather clad growler will be the envy of the town.

Complimentary personalization make this a wonderful gift. Mention at check out or email us with the name you would like. Letters are limited to 1/4 tall block capital letters.

The growler carrier is handcrafted in Missoula, MT.  It is made entirely without the use of machines. The leather is hand cut, hand dyed and hand finished. The leather is conditioned with a leather cream for water resistancy. 

The leather is the some of the  finest American leather available.  It is tanned in a century-old family-owned tannery in Pennsylvania.  The leather is created to age beautifully.  It will darken and develop a rich patina with use.

Also available in Buff - http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/product/leather-growler-carrier-with-bicycle-straps-made-in-usa

See our other bike accessories - http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/category/leather-for-the-bicycle

Growler is NOT included.

name: Leather Growler Carrier with Bicycle Straps / Made in USA
description:
Bring Your Own Beer On Your Bicycle (BYOBOYB)

What better way to spend you day than a bike ride to your local brewers?  Strap you growler to your bike and be the envy of the town!  

Complimentary personalization is available. Leave a note at check out or send us an email at cicadaleathercompany@gmail.com

Fits most glass 64 ounce growlers.

The leather will darken from Pale Ale to Porter with use and exposure to the sun.

Growler is not included.

name: Leather Drink Coaster Set Made in USA
description:
These luxury leather coasters are made of the best American-tanned leather. This leather is Bridle leather which is the most water resistant making it ideal for coasters. 

Hand cut and finished, each coaster is varies slightly from the others. 

 One of the four has the Cicada Leather Company lightly embossed into the leather.


Set of 4

Each coaster is 1/8 of an inch thick. 

Dimensions 3.5 x 3.5 inches

Crafted by an American Artisan

Cup not included

name: Leather Key Cover
description:
Differentiate between your keys with a leather key cover. Feel the warmth of leather every time you unlock a door. 

The perfect gift for a new homeowner!

Made of America full-grain leather.
Hand cut, hand stitched and hand finished in Missoula, MT.

<><><> Not guaranteed to fit your keys. Check the measurements before purchasing and read our policy page. <><><>

name: Leather Cord Organizer - Blue,Teal, Black, Pink - Made in USA
description:
Leather Cord Organizer - Larger than our iPhone cord organizers, using this handy leather cable manger to control cords of all sorts. Good for charger cords, hair dyer cords, even crock pot cords! 

Bundle the cords around your fingers and place in the organizer. Snap the organizer around the cord. Simple and effective!

This cord organizer is made of high quality American leather. It is not made of scraps but of the best American leather on the market. The snap is a strong steel snap.

Comes in many colors - Black, Nude, Pink, Blue, Teal, Oxblood!

Get one for your earbuds too!


Customer Reviews: 
“ Awesome cord organizer, the only one that works on my MacBook Pro power cord!” - D.D.

“I found it very useful, practical and wearable. It is so easy to carry on! In fact I am thinking about in getting some more!” V.F.

“Very nice! Love my cord organizer!” A.F.

name: Leather Earbud Cord Organizer / Made in USA
description:
A simple, unobtrusive way to keep your earbud cord under control. Made of high quality real leather, this holder allows you to organize your cords without any bulky contraption. 

Simply slide the holder onto the cord, wrap the cord around three fingers, place the bundle in the holder and snap shut. This holder is small enough that you can leave it on the cord at all times. That way you wont loose the holder!

This listing is for one earbud holder.

name: Leather Key Chain
description:
A simple and classic way to keep track of your keys.

The leather key chain is made of high-quality American full-grain leather and an iron key ring. This keychain's edges are dyed brown in house. It has been conditioned to be water resistant. 

The leather will darken with age, use and exposure to sun. It will develop a nice patina.

The leather section is about 6 inches long and 3/4 of an inch across. The ring is 26mm in diameter. The keychain is completed with a double cap rivet. Our logo is engraved on the back.

This keychain makes finding your keys easy. Our key covers make finding the right key easy too. They come in fun colors like Pink and Teal - http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/product/leather-key-cover

The key chain was handcrafted in America without any machines.

name: Leather Keychain with Brass Snap Belt Clip Hook Made in USA
description:
Handcrafted tan leather keychain with belt hook and key ring.

This key chain is made with high quality leather and solid brass ring and hook. With a ring at one end and a belt snap at the other, loosing your keys just became much harder. 

The leather section is 4 inches by 1 inch. Including the hardware, the key chain is 6 1/2 inches long. 

This listing is for the tan leather key chain. Check out this key chain in brown! http://www.cicadaleathercompany.com/product/brown-leather-key-chain-with-ring-and-belt-hook

Handcrafted in America by an artisan leathersmith

name: Satchel for Paul
description:
This is a custom order for Paul. Please contact us if you are interested in this product.

Hand stitched leather satchel 
- Hidden back pocket
-Luggage Strap
-2/3 length front flap
- Removable shoulder strap with brass clasps
-Top Handle
-Internal pockets for iPad, iPhone, cards, pens

Dimensions: 
15 x 12.5 x 3.5

Made of American-made threads, conditioners, and full grain leather.
The leather will darken with use and exposure to sun.

Production Time: 4-5 weeks

name: Black Leather Belt for Men with Three Piece Buckle Made in USA
description:
Handcrafted leather belt for men with three piece buckle set made in America.

This item is made to order and will ship 3 to 4 weeks after order. 

Made with high quality leather tanned in a century-and-a-half old American tannery. Hand dyed, hand edged, and hand stitched, this belt is made without the use of machines. 

The leather has been treated to be water resistant. It will age nicely with use and time. 


Made in America.

name: Hand Crafted American Made Leather Belt Silver Three Piece Buckle
description:
- Handcrafted single section of sturdy 8 ounce cowhide leather 

- Three piece buckle set with texture

- Tapered belt gives the impression of a skinny belt

- Conditioned with pine pitch, oils, and beeswax

- For casual and dress wear

- Medium brown antique color

-Hand cut and finished in Montana

name: Black Leather Belt for Men Handmade in America
description:
Handcrafted in the USA - Black Leather Belt with Solid Brass Buckle

This handcrafted black leather belt will last for years. Dyed in house, the leather is treated to prevent bleeding. It is made with 1/2 cm thick veg-tanned leather, conditioned to be water resistant. The edges are hand finished using artisan locally produced beeswax. 

The buckle is made of solid brass which gives it a good weight. The buckle is polished and coated with a high quality lacquer finish for years of use without tarnish.

With use the leather will relax while maintaining its integrity. This belt has been conditioned with environmentally -friendly oils, waxes, and pine pitch to ensure that it lasts for many years.

Please indicate your size upon ordering. To do this, take your favorite belt and measure from where the material meets the buckle to your favorite hole. This will ensure that your new belt fits perfectly. If this is a gift, please indicate the gender and general size (Sm, M, L) or the recipient.

name: Tan Leather Belt Handmade in USA
description:
Handcrafted in America - Unisex Leather Belt

This handcrafted leather belt will last many years. It is made with 1/2 cm thick veg-tanned leather, conditioned to be water resistant. The buckle and belt loop are attached by hand-stitched waxed linen thread for extra strength. The edges are hand finished using artisan locally produced beeswax. 

The buckle is made of solid brass which gives it a good weight. The buckle is polished and coated with a proprietary finish for years of use without tarnish.

The leather is a neutral color but with use and time will darken, gaining a deep patina. The leather will relax while maintaining its integrity. This belt has been conditioned with oils, waxes, and pine pitch to ensure that it lasts for many years.

Please indicate your size upon ordering. To do this, take your favorite belt and measure from where the material meets the buckle to your favorite hole. This will ensure that your new belt fits perfectly. If this is a gift please indicate the gender and general size (Sm, M, L) or the recipient.

name: Leather and Burgundy Ribbon Cuff Bracelet for Women
description:
Thick tan leather wraps around the wrist and ends in a beautiful magenta velveteen bow. The contrast on textures is alluring. 

The ribbon makes the bracelet adjustable for all wrist sizes. The edges are dyed a dark chocolate color for contrast. 

This bracelet would complete a summer outfit. 

The leather is 6 1/4 inches long which has been conditioned and made water resistant.
Handcrafted in America.

name: Leather and Chocolate Ribbon Cuff Bracelet
description:
Thick tan leather wraps around the wrist and ends in a beautiful Chocolate velveteen bow. The contrast on textures is alluring.

The ribbon makes the bracelet adjustable for all wrist sizes. The edges are dyed a dark chocolate color for contrast.

The leather is 6 1/4 inches long which has been conditioned and made water resistant. 
Handcrafted in America.

name: Minimalist Wallet or Card Case Made in USA
description:
This wallet is made of high quality leather from North American steer, tanned in the US. It is completely handcrafted (hand cut, hand stitched, hand finished). with no use of machines.

This duel toned wallet will age beautifully. With use and time, the leather will darken into a rich caramel color. The leather will relax but maintain its integrity. The waxed linen thread is handstitched using a durable method to ensure that the wallet will last many years.

Dimensions: 3 3/4 inches by 3 inches. (around 9.5 by 7.6 cm)

name: Leather Mouse Cat Toy Made in USA
description:
This mouse is made of real leather. It is hand stitched for extra strength. It has a nice long tail and cute ears.

 The body is 3 inches long and 1.5 inches across. The tail adds six inches in length.

The leather has not been treated with any conditioners.  

According to a customer "This is the best cat toy in the whole world. My cat pounced on it immediately and has been doing somersaults and pirouettes for the last half hour. There's something about the stiffness of the leather and the triangular shape that has somehow convinced him that it's real. Hands down worth the money. Thank you!"

As this mouse is handmade, each one is varies slightly from the images.

name: Shipping Upgrade - Domestic Only
description:
Upgrade your shipping to get your package sooner. With this upgrade you will get your purchases in 2-3 business days!

This is for domestic orders only. For international shipping upgrades please contact us.

Tracking is included!

Disclaimer: Cicada Leather Company can NOT guarantee delivery times. The United States Postal Service does not guarantee the 2-3 day arrival time on Priority Mail. We at Cicada Leather Company will do everything we can to ensure your packages arrive on time.
